About Us

Ruda Patrice is based on the fundamental ideas of responsibility, ethics & transparency. Offering new takes on what a brand can be. Our products are rooted around circularity and an honest approach.

We met in 2015 at work. It sounds cliché, but there's always that one work friend who stays with you for life, and we were each other's. We've worked in different industries and have our own competencies. Here, we quickly found a common passion that we both share. There was no doubt that we wanted to work with responsible production and unique products.

What Daniel has to say about Patrick?

Patrick

“Its second nature for Mille to be active. It inspires me how she can make any physical activity feel like play time. She’s good at cheering her team mates on & she’s stubborn like no other when it comes to endurance. Did I mention she turns into a fish as soon as she sees any type of water?”

- Daniel

What Patrick has to say about Daniel?

Daniel

“Daniel has grown up playing a ton of team sports. She’s the first to grab a racket and actually play at a decent level even if it’s her first time. I admire her attitude towards anything – always so positive :) She’s competitive yet extremely fair & community driven.”

- Patrick
